context: As of 2024, Freshworks ranks 6th among 7,759 competitors in business software. Competitive landscape characterized by dominance of major platforms (Salesforce, HubSpot, Zendesk), rise of AI-native competitors (Forethought, Uniphore), and specialized solutions. Market shifted toward AI-powered automation and unified platforms.
